body:
ArrayIncludesIndexofAssembler::Generate(SearchVariant variant) - builtins/builtins-array-gen.cc
Preconditions/guards snippet:
- BranchIfFastJSArrayForRead(receiver, context, &init_index, &call_runtime) // ensures receiver is fast JSArray
- LoadFastJSArrayLength(array) ; TaggedIsPositiveSmi check
- fromIndex handling: allow Smi or undefined; non-smi/other -> call_runtime
- Check startIndex >= length -> return not found
- LoadElementsKind(array); dispatch:
  - IsElementsKindLessThanOrEqual(... HOLEY_SMI_ELEMENTS) -> Smi path
  - IsElementsKindLessThanOrEqual(... HOLEY_ELEMENTS) -> SmiOrObject path
  - PACKED_DOUBLE_ELEMENTS -> packed doubles path
  - HOLEY_DOUBLE_ELEMENTS -> holey doubles path
  - default: return not found / slow
Explanation: This is the main dispatcher for Array.prototype.includes fast-paths. It performs fast-array checks, length/read-only Smi length expectations, fromIndex fast handling (only Smi/undefined), elements kind dispatch. If checks fail it routes to runtime slow path.  This entry is used by TF_BUILTIN(ArrayIncludes, ...).
explanation: Main fast dispatcher for Array.includes. Adds preconditions for fast JSArray, Smi length, Smi/undefined fromIndex, and elements-kind-based specialized paths for Smi/Object and Double kinds. Routes to runtime when harmful side-effects may have invalidated fast-path assumptions.
